org.kepler.webview.server

Class WebViewConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.webview.server.WebViewConfiguration

  • public class WebViewConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to read WebView configuration.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
